targets.query: show tag values cardinality from "idrac-hosts" with key = "system-name"
SELECT "bios-version" FROM "idrac-hosts" WHERE ("system-name" =~ /^$idrac_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "system-name" LIMIT 1

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  avg_over_time(
    amperageProbeReading{job="prometheus-snmp-exporter", instance="$idrac_host", amperageProbeLocationName=~"PS\\d+ Current.*"}[10m]) / 10, "probe", "$1", "amperageProbeLocationName", "(PS\\d+).*")
* on(instance, probe)
label_replace(
  avg_over_time(
    voltageProbeReading{job="prometheus-snmp-exporter", instance="$idrac_host", voltageProbeLocationName=~"PS\\d+ Voltage.*"}[10m]) / 1000, "probe", "$1", "voltageProbeLocationName", "(PS\\d+).*")

targets.query: SELECT "log-dates" FROM "idrac-hosts" WHERE ("system-name" =~ /^$idrac_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "log-number" LIMIT 1

targets.expr: avg_over_time(temperatureProbeReading{job="prometheus-snmp-exporter", instance="$idrac_host", temperatureProbeLocationName=~"System Board Inlet Temp|System Board Exhaust Temp"}[30m]) / 10
